CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03C03

TITLE.P: Tradesman Services, Helse Møre og Romsdal HF [Møre og Romsdal Regional Health Authority].

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority hereby invites tenderers to an open tender contest for framework agreements for trade services. Through this competition, the Contracting Authority wants to enter into framework agreements for trade services to meet the Contracting Authority's needs for the operation, maintenance and development of the building stock. Framework agreements will be signed per trade. The framework agreement applies to the Contracting Authority's properties and any leased premises. The scope is reduced from that in the previously cancelled notification. The contracts are valid for 1 year, with an option on 1 year + 1 year + 1 year, with a total maximum of 4 years. Contracts will only be established with one tenderer per discipline, for each hospital. A total of 31 contracts.

Helse Møre og Romsdal HF (HMR) hereby invites tenderers to an open tender competition for entry into framework agreements on building automation in Kristiansund. Through this competition, the Contracting Authority wants to enter into framework agreements for trade services to meet HMR's needs in connection with the operation, maintenance and development of the buildings at Kristiansund Hospital. The framework agreement applies to HMR's properties and any leased premises.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracts are valid for 1 year, with an option on 1 year + 1 year + 1 year, totalling 4 years.
